message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm looking to save as much as I can.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm really looking to save as much as I can.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiation skills.  Let's make this happen - $87.50, and we have a deal.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82. I'm really trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, this is my final offer. $85, and we can close this out today.  What do you say?
I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really trying to get the best deal I can.
